bio: A Yo-kai who whisks TV remotes away on dreamy, romantic dates and then leaves them in the very strangest of places.

soultimate.name: Channel Changer
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' attack power for a time.

skill.effect: 7.5% HP restored every 2 sec when unseen by foes.
skill.name: Hide and Heal

name: Count Zapaway
